alert.note: Alert for East Washington South Central Cascade Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 06 at 9:10PM PDT until September 10 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HEIGHTENED FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS TODAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... ...HEIGHTENED FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS AGAIN FRIDAY AND SATURDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE WA695... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 695 East Washington South Central Cascade Mountains. * WINDS...East 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 18 percent. * IMPACTS...Winds and low relative humidities could cause enhanced fire weather behavior and allow existing fires to more easily spread.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: East Washington South Central Cascade Mountains
